adjectives.description: hypermnestic (comparative more hypermnestic, superlative most hypermnestic)

entries.meaning: Pertaining to hypermnesia; demonstrating or pertaining to a very high level of memory or recall.
examples: The fact that the dream has at its disposal recollections which are inaccessible to the waking person is so remarkable and theoretically significant that I should like to reinforce it by recounting some more ‘hypermnestic’ [translating hypermnestischer] dreams.
